title: Interpretation of the color silver in a dream and its meaning according to Ibn Sirin: good or bad skin

preview.html: Interpretation of the color of silver in dreamsThe interpretation of the color of silver in a dream is the interpretation that depends on the gender of the fortuneteller, whether male or female, as well as on his social status. The interpretation of this dream for a single person differs from its interpretation for a married person, and the details of the dream play an important role in determining its interpretation. Through the following lines in the encyclopedia, we will present the interpretation given by scholars in the interpretation of the dream of silver. Follow us. The color silver in the dream indicates that there will be happy events It will happen in the dreamer's life. Whoever sees in his dream that he is wearing silver. His vision showed his high stature and height. The silver color in a patient’s dream symbolizes the imminent recovery from his illness. Dreaming of selling something that has a silver color is a sign that the dreamer will lose something valuable to him. If one sees in a dream that his wife is wearing something silver. His vision showed stability and happiness in his life with her. As for the single person who sees silver in his dream, it means that he will marry a beautiful girl. Receiving a silver gift in a dream indicates that God Almighty will grant the dreamer happiness in his life. Interpretation of the color silver in a dream by Ibn Sirin, says the scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin The color silver in a dream symbolizes the dreamer saving an amount of money. Whoever sees a large amount of silver in a dream. His vision indicated that he obtained a lot of money from a legitimate source. If someone sees silver jewelry in his dream; The dream indicates that he knows a beautiful woman. Losing silver in a dream indicates that there are problems between him and his life partner, whether the dreamer is a man or a woman. Interpretation of the color of silver in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman who sees something silver in her dream symbolizes the occurrence of events that will... It causes her joy and happiness. An auspicious vision for one girl is to wear something silver. This vision expresses her close relationship with a religious and affectionate man. If an unmarried girl sees that she is buying silver; Her vision showed the achievement of her goals and success in her work. Silver color in a dream for a married woman. A married woman’s dream of silver is a promising dream that the dreamer will hear news that will make her happy. This dream also indicates that the dreamer will gain a lot of goodness and wealth. Silver in a married woman’s dream symbolizes that she is characterized by generosity and symbolizes Also to her love and appreciation for those around her. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband gives her something of silver. Her vision showed her husband’s devotion to her and his honesty with her. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is in a silver place. This means that she lives in peace and tranquility, whether in her social or professional life. Silver color in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees something silver in her dream. Her vision indicates that she will give birth to a female and she will have a good character and personality. This vision also indicates that the woman’s health will be stable during pregnancy and after childbirth. The silver color in a dream for a divorced woman. The silver color in a divorced woman’s dream symbolizes her freedom from the problems and pains that she suffers from. Silver shoes in A dream: If an unmarried girl sees herself wearing silver shoes in her dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting my son in the face

preview.html: Likewise, if the beating leaves a mark or any pain, and many other factors affect the meanings and connotations of this dream in reality. The interpretation of seeing my son slapped in the face in a dream for a single girl. An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is hitting a boy in the face, this dream is a sign of evil. And this The vision indicates that this girl will go through many problems and crises in her life, and God knows best. For an unmarried girl to see in a dream that her father is beating her in a dream is a sign that her marriage contract is imminent. The previous vision may indicate the great love between the father and his daughter and their new relationship. If she is exposed One girl being beaten with a shoe in a dream, this is a bad omen and an indication of this girl’s disobedience to the Lord of the Worlds. Some commentators believe that the unmarried girl saw her father hitting her in the face and she suffered a lot from this beating and screaming. This previous vision shows that this girl will have bad things about her and will She is being slandered by the people around her. This dream may indicate a good husband who wants to marry her and she rejects him and then feels remorse after that. If the beating of an unmarried girl in a dream is severe and causes pain, then this indicates success and kindness. See also: I dreamed that I I hit my son in the face. Interpretation of seeing my son hitting his face in a dream about a married woman. When a married woman dreams that she hits her son, this is a good sign. This dream indicates that this married woman will enjoy a quiet life and enormous wealth in the future, and God knows best. In general, scholars explain that the vision A person slaps his son in the face. It means good news that will benefit him in the coming days. If a married woman sees that she is slapping her son in the face in a dream, this indicates her intense love for her son. This vision also shows that her son will hold the highest positions and be successful in his life. If A married woman dreamed that she hit her son in the face in a dream to raise him. In this dream, this indicates that this woman will be defeated in something that concerns her and she must be careful. Interpretation of seeing my son hitting his face in a dream about a man and its meaning. When a man sees in a dream that he is hitting his son in the face, this indicates This boy will get married soon. When a man hits his son with a stick, this indicates that he has gone through many problems and difficulties in his professional life. The previous vision also indicates that this man’s professional life is in danger, and he can be expelled from it, and God will compensate him. The dream of a man Hitting his son in a dream is a good sign and may indicate a new source of livelihood and abundant money. A man who hits his son in the face or any other part of his body in a dream means sadness and crises. The previous vision is not necessarily related to the vision, as it may indicate problems with A family member. When a man sees that in a dream he is hitting his son with a shoe, this indicates his bad reputation. When a man dreams that he is hitting his son with a whip or a belt, this is a good omen. This dream indicates that this person will achieve his ambitions and fulfill his desires in reality. As it is interpreted Some scholars previously view man as facing a crisis in...

title: Interpretation of a dream about running through rainwater in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about running in rainwater in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about running in rainwater in a dream, and it is one of the dreams that some people see, but there are a number of interpretations that the site explains, quoting the interpretations of some working scholars who are seeking to reach the truth. Interpretation of a dream about running in rainwater Rainwater in a dream: In the event that there is a personal opinion that he was running through the airport in a dream, this may indicate the comfort that the dreamer feels at that time. Running in the rain in a dream may indicate that the dreamer has lost his worries and sorrows. If someone sees that he is running in the rain This may indicate responding to invitations and getting rid of the fears facing the dreamer. Seeing a person running through rainwater may indicate repentance and a return to God, Blessed and Most High, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running after sheep in a dream in the event that a person saw that he was running after sheep. This may indicate the large number of assets that the dreamer will acquire in those days. Seeing him running after sheep in a dream may indicate the large sums of money that the dreamer will obtain during this period, and God knows best. Seeing a person running after sheep may indicate a high status. And a pioneer that the dreamer would have reached in those days. Seeing him running after sheep in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desires and dreams during that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running in the snow in a dream: Seeing a person may indicate that he was running in the snow in a dream. It can indicate a lot of money that the dreamer gets in his life during this time. The person who saw that he was running in the snow in a dream can indicate the difficulties that the dreamer may face in his life at that time. In case one saw that he was running in the snow Snow, this may indicate that he made a lot of effort to reach the dreams and aspirations of those days, thanks to God. To see yourself running in the snow in a dream can mean peace and getting rid of the crises that the visionary was facing in his family life, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of running To the market in a dream: Anyone who dreams that he was running in the market may indicate the abundance of livelihood that the dreamer will receive in those days. In the event that one saw that he was running in the market, this may indicate the broad diet and high positions that the dreamer acquired during these days. Period. If someone saw that he was running in the market, this may indicate the fatigue and unhappiness that the dreamer is experiencing during those days. Seeing running in the market in a dream can also indicate the big changes that occur in the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running in a torrent in a dream: If one sees that he was running in a torrent in a dream, this could indicate the disaster that the dreamer fell into and must ask God for help. title: Interpretation of white clothes in a dream... The meaning of white clothes in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of the white dress in a dream. In today’s article on the Encyclopedia website, we resolve this dispute with interpretations from people of knowledge and vision, as the interpretation varies according to the dreamer, as seeing white clothes for a married woman is different from a pregnant woman and is a sign of easy childbirth, unlike a divorced woman. It is a sign of the beginning of a new life, as well as a different interpretation for a man if he is single or married. While people search for the meaning of their dreams during sleep, there are those who believe in the interpretations and follow the sign in their lives and this may push him to leave his job or something important in his life because he sees a nightmare or something Scary. . A dream, so interpreters place signs that show us the signs present in the dream, to prevent confusion and not follow everyone who claims to have insight and the ability to interpret dreams and visions. In the article, we discuss the interpretations of the scholar Ibn Sirin, Imam Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, and their words about the white dress in a dream for women and men. As well as single people, in addition to the interpretation of dirty clothes, you will find in the following lines. Interpretation of the white dress in a dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a white dress in a dream for someone who wears a white dress in his life is evidence of integrity in matters of religion and life. A sign of tranquility, peace of mind, peace of mind and whoever sees such a thing. The vision is described as being generous in morals. Seeing a white dress in a dream indicates that the person having the vision enjoys psychological balance, inner comfort and reassurance, in addition to being characterized by the wisdom of his mind. However, if the dreamer is a worker or a profession, this indicates his leave and transition to rest. Seeing a white dress is a sign of That the dreamer is conscientious and coexists peacefully, and that his life is free of worries. Seeing a woolen garment indicates abundant livelihood and an abundance of money. As for whoever was single in his life, it is a sign of marriage. As for whoever saw a white garment dirty in his dream, this is an indication that its owner is suffering from a problem. In his life. Interpretation of a dream about white clothes for single women: Seeing a dream about white clothes for an unmarried woman is a good sign and indicates a happy event for her and that her life will enjoy emotional and psychological stability, as the vision indicates that: Dreaming in general about a girl who has a dream is interpreted as a sign of marriage to a man whom she agrees to. He will be righteous in worldly matters, as the white dress is like a wedding dress. The interpretation of a girl’s dream of a white dress that she buys is a sign of a happy event that will change her life, such as entering a new job, engagement, or success in her life’s affairs. Loose white clothes indicate good character and kindness for the girl, as Seeing a white dress in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of kindness. Seeing clothes changing from color to white indicates that there are pressures and crises in the girl’s life, but she will survive and pass them safely. White clothes in a dream for a married woman. White clothes in a dream for a married woman are considered signs that About the fairness of the husband’s relationship with his wife, and fairness in

title: The symbol of eggs in a single woman's dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for one girl: Seeing a large amount of eggs in a woman’s dream. Evidence that the dreamer is successful in his academic, professional, or emotional life. It is also said that seeing eggs at home is a sign that the dreamer takes care of himself. She is always ready to look beautiful and attractive. Buying eggs in one dream is a sign that the girl is looking for a suitable husband. Collecting eggs in a dream is evidence that her marriage is approaching. If the dreamer intentionally breaks eggs in a dream, then he is seeking to know some facts around them, and God knows best. And whoever sees eggs breaking in a dream by accident, then he may He discovers some things by chance, and God knows best. Interpretation scholars say that collecting broken eggs in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign that she will become pregnant quickly once she gets married, God willing. Baladi eggs in a dream are a symbol of healing and well-being, and rotten eggs are problems and fears. Colored eggs are friends of different nationalities. If a girl sees in her dream that a stranger is giving her eggs. She may marry a poor person and she may suffer a lot in her marriage, and God knows best. See also: Rotten eggs in a dream. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a married woman. Eggs in a married woman’s dream are a symbol of abundance and abundance of offspring. The greater the number of eggs. , wealth and wealth increased in her home, provided that the eggs are healthy. Seeing few eggs is a sign of limited livelihood and lack of offspring, and God knows best. Seeing buying eggs in a dream means that children will grow up and receive good care. This dream also expresses family ties. And kinship. If a woman sees a lot of eggs in her room. This is evidence of her interest in adornment and beauty for the sake of her husband, and colored eggs are female offspring. If a woman dreams that she is pregnant and gives birth to an egg. May God bless her with a son who has a bright future, but outside, and God knows best. Seeing broken eggs in The dream indicates the emergence of some problems and conflicts between the dreamer and her husband, and the disputes may reach the parents. If a woman collects eggshells in a dream, she is trying to calm things down between her and her husband and repair the relationship between them again. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a man and its meaningEggs in a man’s dream symbolize His work and financial stability. The more eggs in the dream, the greater the financial stability and success at work, and God knows best. Seeing many broken eggs in a dream is a sign of many fears and troubles in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation scholars say that he eats eggshells or collects them in a man’s dream. Evidence of people lying, gossiping, and many sins and sins. When a man dreams of a hen laying eggs, this is a sign that his wife will give birth to many children. Seeing an egg in a dream is a sign of poverty and distress. Using rotten eggs in food is evidence of usury and illicit money. It is said that distributing Eggs in a dream are among the good deeds that the dreamer has done. Breaking eggs in a dream is a sign of illness in children, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dreams about eggs. The meaning of seeing eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream and their interpretation. Eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolize

title: Interpretation of a dream about a husband in a dream about war

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a husband going to war in a dream In case you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about a husband going to war in a dream, there are a large number of connotations and interpretations of dreams and we find that in general, scholars and diligent people search for interpretations, and the site managers do not interfere in the interpretations, but rather convey Interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a husband in a dream about war. A dream about a husband entering war in a dream may indicate some of the tensions and stress that he suffers from during those days. Anyone who sees in her dream that her husband will go to war may indicate some of the problems and fears that they face in life at that time. If a woman sees that her husband is on her way to war, this may indicate the many temptations that the woman falls into and she must approach God Almighty. If she sees the husband going to war in a dream, this may indicate that some disputes and problems will occur between them during this time, and God Almighty. I know. Interpretation of a dream about a husband leaving her in a dream: In the event that a woman sees that her husband is leaving, this may indicate his need for great help during this time. A woman’s dream of her husband leaving her may indicate a feeling of disappointment or despair during this time. In the event that a woman sees her husband leaving her This may indicate severe pain that she feels, and anxiety and tension from her husband. Dreaming of a husband leaving his wife in a dream may indicate his serious suffering or exposure to a major problem arising between them, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband on a bus trip in a dream: Seeing the husband going on a bus trip may indicate Extreme sadness he faces during this time and he needs to ask God for help. If a woman sees that her husband is going on a bus trip in a dream, this may indicate his inability to have significant control over his life during this period. A dream about her husband going on a bus trip may indicate In a dream, it indicates some changes occurring in their lives in those days, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing the husband going on a bus trip in the dream may indicate the social situation that will change in the coming days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a woman going with her deceased husband in a dream may indicate A woman’s decision to go with her deceased husband in a dream indicates that she was feeling very afraid about something at that time. If the woman sees that she is going with her deceased husband, this may indicate the deceased’s anger at the woman’s behavior during this period, and God knows best. In the event that she sees the husband The deceased coming to pick up his wife in a dream, this may indicate the comfort and security that the wife feels after extreme fatigue and suffering during this period. Seeing the husband coming back to life to take his wife in the dream may indicate the soon relief that will befall him during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation Dreaming of going to a marriage exam in a dream. If they see their husband going for an examination in a dream, this may indicate positive changes in their lives during this period, and God knows best. Seeing your husband going for some tests in a dream may mean that he is facing a problem and that he will overcome it, thanks to God. It is possible to see The husband goes

title: Learn about the interpretation of drinking wine in a dream and not getting drunk, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of drinking wine in a dream and not getting drunk? The interpretation of drinking wine in a dream without getting drunk contains many connotations, and the jurists differed regarding it. Some of them said that it is a positive interpretation, while others said that it is a negative interpretation, and until you discover what are the precise symbols within this vision that transform the meaning Of exile. To the positive and vice versa, you should follow this article to the end.Do you have a dream that confuses you? Do you expect that? Google for an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of drinking wine in a dream without getting drunk. Interpretation of a dream about drinking wine and not getting drunk is evidence that the dreamer does not fear God Almighty, as he commits immorality, commits sins, is not ashamed of the Lord of the Worlds, and does not think about the afterlife and what. What will happen to him upon his death? Some jurists said that drinking wine in a dream and not feeling drunk is evidence of plentiful sustenance, especially if the dreamer is one of those who love God and His Messenger in reality and behave well. But if the dreamer chooses the world and its pleasures and rejects religion and sees that he drinks more wine Of various kinds without getting drunk, he can enjoy his life through forbidden money from different sources, all of which are questionable. Interpretation of drinking wine in a dream without getting drunk according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that the owner of the orphans’ money will actually see this vision in his dream, but if he feels drunk and loses Awareness means he stops his bad deeds and repents to God and asks for forgiveness and forgiveness. And if the dreamer saw in a dream that he was sitting with someone and they both drank alcohol, and the dreamer drank a lot of alcohol without feeling drunk, and lied to the person sitting with him that he was unconscious, then this scene is with everyone. Its details indicate the dreamer’s lies and hypocrisy in dealing with others, to gain many interests from them. Interpretation of drinking wine in a dream without single drunk women When the dreamer falls on a piece of land in the dream and someone gave her a cup of wine as juice and she drank it, and everyone expected that she fainted, but she She stayed awake and did not feel drunk, as this indicates that she was deceived by someone. Deception is coming soon, but God will save her from it. If she sees her fiancé drinking alcohol in a dream and feels drunk, knowing that he is a religious young man, then God will hold him dearer than he was before, and he will refrain from any action that takes him away from God and undermines him. Possible. The relationship with him. If the dreamer drinks alcohol in abundance and its taste is beautiful, then perhaps this girl will be among the people of Paradise, and God will give her a high degree for her, as the Lord of the Worlds said in His beloved Book (And rivers of wine are delicious to those who drink). Interpretation of drinking wine in a dream without a married woman drinking. One of the commentators said If a married woman drinks alcohol in a dream without getting drunk, knowing that she lives under many pressures and problems in her life, then this is a positive sign of her strength in facing difficulties and crises without fear or anxiety. If her husband is a cruel man and his actions are bad, and she sees that he drinks more alcohol than he does not drink, then this dream has a bad meaning and shows his many sins and his escape from the world and his desires. And if the dreamer sees that he is in Paradise and drinks the wine of Paradise

title: Interpretation of the court in a dream for a married man and woman

preview.html: Interpretation of the court in a dream: Many people's dreams can be a sign or good news for them, or it can just be an attempt by the subconscious to relive daily events. We will learn all this and more in today’s article. Interpretation of the court in a dream for a married man and woman. Interpretation of the court in a dream for a single woman. Seeing the court in a dream is one of the good dreams whose interpretations vary depending on the individual’s condition and often indicates establishing justice, removing injustice from people, and refuting falsehood. Seeing the court in a dream For an unmarried woman, it means that she has discovered something hidden and mysterious that she has been trying for a long time to decipher and discover the truth. And whoever sees herself in a dream that she is in the courtroom with a young man, this is good news for her relationship with a fair and just man who warns against injustice and watches God in his actions and deeds. Seeing a judge in a dream An unmarried woman may mean that she will reach a high position and a high position by virtue of her justice and her walking on the path of truth. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of a court in a dream Married woman Seeing a court in a married woman’s dream may indicate an injustice committed against her and an arbitrary accusation against her, but soon her innocence will appear She will obtain her rights and will be pushed back because of injustice and oppression. A married woman’s conversation with a judge in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s attempt to explain a certain opinion or her attempt to convince someone of an idea she has until she succeeds in this matter. If she sees in her dream that she holds judicial authority, this may indicate To her success in raising her children on the correct foundations and good morals, and that she is an ideal mother who was able to complete her mission to the fullest. It may be a message that he should follow his path and not deviate from it. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the court in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing the court in a pregnant woman’s dream can relate to the fetus and the birth process, and it can relate to other matters apart from pregnancy. Seeing a court in a daydream can indicate the end of fears and problems related to pregnancy, and thus the birth process will be smooth and easy and without pain or suffering. Seeing this vision can be related to the need to think logically and judge things in a rational way so that the dreamer can come up with solutions. Good for the difficulties he faces in life. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a court in a man’s dream. Seeing a court in a man’s dream may symbolize the collapse of the problems and worries that he faces in his life and his justice in some matters related to him. Perhaps seeing a court in a man’s dream symbolizes his distinguished qualities. And his good habits that raise his status and increase his dignity and status. Whoever sees in a dream that he rejects some light decisions approved by the judge, then this vision can be considered a sign that he does not accept some of the negative things that surround him and that he must adapt to them. See also: Pregnancy A friend's hand in a dreamInterpretation of the court in a dream for single people The visions of single people carry many signs related to...

title: What is the promising vision for marriage in 2021?

preview.html: Auspicious dream of marriage: In our lives we expect many things and dreams that we hope will come true, and even a certain sign heralds us of the approaching realization. Among these signs that indicate that we may have a specific dream that we dream about, we resort to interpreting that for us it is a sign of approaching something that we are waiting for, and one of these topics is marriage. Today and until today, various, we will talk about the auspicious dream of marriage. What are the dreams that may indicate the approach of marriage? Follow us. The concept of marriage. Marriage is a relationship between a man and a woman that is based on understanding, love, and forming a family within certain morals and customs in the society to which they belong. When is the vision real and when does it become a reality? First of all, we must first clarify when the dream is real and when it will be achieved, Whether it is about marriage or something else: First, the vision must have a known time, that is, the day and time must be clear. One of the signs that the vision will come true is that there is a symbol of nature in it. For the vision of marriage to come true, it is necessary that the details The dream in relation to the place and nature of life is similar to the details that the dreamer actually lives. The dreamer sees that he is speaking in the dream as one of the signs of its fulfillment. If the dreamer wakes up with a sign indicating its completion like all the other verses of the Qur’an. What are the real signs of seeing? Before we talk about the auspicious dream of marriage, we will discuss what it is. Evidence of the truth of this dream? In the beginning, the dream should not be about something he saw in reality or thinks about a lot, as it will be self-talk and he does not understand it. That the dreamer does not see in his dream anything that frightens him or makes him panic. That the dream he dreamed is clear and he can remember it And retelling it. The auspicious vision of marriage and some of these visions: There are many auspicious wedding dreams that a girl can dream of, which may indicate the approaching of her marriage, and these dreams include: If a girl dreams that she is well-groomed and wearing jewels and gems, then this indicates the approach of her marriage, by God. I know. If an unmarried girl dreams of seeing the Holy Qur’an in a dream, this means that her marriage is approaching. And the dreamer’s dream of performing Hajj is evidence that his marriage is approaching, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is changing family, this means that her marriage is approaching. If If an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing a wedding dress in a dream, this is a harbinger of approaching marriage. If a girl dreams that she will be wearing shoes in a dream, this means that her marriage is approaching. If an unmarried girl dreams of seeing the moon, this indicates her marriage to a handsome and prominent man. If If an unmarried young man dreams of the sun in a dream, this indicates his marriage, and God knows best. Seeing water in a dream also indicates the approach of marriage. If an unmarried girl sees herself wearing a crown, this indicates her marriage. If an unmarried girl sees herself eating dates in a dream, This indicates that her marriage is approaching. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is changing her place of residence, this means that her marriage is approaching. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream that her family and relatives are together means that
